description: This file provides frontend-only utilities for managing application data persistence, including loading, saving, resetting, and updating application records and their timeline events, using localStorage and static seed data.

methods.name: safeJsonParse
methods.description: Parses JSON string safely, returning fallback on error.

methods.name: isoToday
methods.description: Returns current date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

methods.name: makeId
methods.description: Generates a unique ID string with optional prefix.

methods.name: normalizeSeedApplication
methods.description: Normalizes application data from seed, ensuring timeline consistency.

methods.name: makeSeed
methods.description: Creates a seed array of applications from static data.
